title: Baked Salmon Asparagus Parcels
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons coarse Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh tarragon', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1/2 teaspoon soy sauce', 'hot pepper sauce to taste', 'salt and white pepper to taste', '2 (150g) wild salmon fillets', '8 slender asparagus spears, trimmed', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '4 lemon wedges for garnish']
